com.github.flowersinthesand.spheres

Interface SocketBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UriAccessor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpSocket, Socket, WebSocket, WsSocket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketSupport, WebSocketSupport, WsSocketWrapper

    public interface SocketBase
extends UriAccessor
    A base interface for all socket interface.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
